entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:40 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then flurries at times heavy changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon then northwest 50 gusting to 70. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:40 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
